positions.title: Student Intern (Mission Support)

positions.description:
Ensure technicians, wholesale, and retail customers get the parts required to do their jobs.

Ensure accurate billing of parts on repair orders and invoices.

Process and send special orders and the daily orders
positions.title: Parts advisor

positions.description: The job entailed much of the same duties as when I first worked for Safeway although I was placed in the position of Assistant Deli Manager. It provided me more leniency to do things as I saw fit and change things for the better, particularly when I was in charge of the department.
positions.title: Assistant Deli Manager

positions.description: I was often called upon to complete tasks on my own and with my team. By the time I left the Army even as lower enlisted, I was placed in charge of training new soldiers, battalion, and brigade leadership alike. By the time I left I was known as the walking field manual for knowing more than most of my leadership due to extensive training and going above and beyond my job and the next job up and was often called upon for my knowledge.
positions.title: Fire Support Specialist

positions.description: While working in this capacity, my main priority was making sure the customers were happy by providing them the highest quality product available. I was also in charge of department training and ensuring the department was clean and displays were appealing.
positions.title: Deli Clerk
